System.description: When checked, the vibration of the Menu button will be disabled.

System.short_description: Disable auto save on low battery.
System.description: If enabled, the console will not auto save and quit on low battery.
If enabled logs will be dumped into .tmp_update/logs

Time.short_description: Set date and time from internet
Time.description:
When checked, you have to set manually the time zone in Onion Tools app (on the console).
If you're not behind a VPN.
(we recommend to disable it to sync time on your MMP thanks to an http API)

When checked, you have to set manually the time zone in Onion Tools app (on the console).
If you're not behind a VPN, we recommend to disable it to sync your time zone on your MMP thanks to an http API.
(Disabled recommended, except if your time zone is not good))
If enabled, the time will be set with NTP (recommended disabled, longer than with http API).

User interface.description: When checked, the expert icon will appear on MainUI.
When checked, the recent icon will appear on MainUI.

Network.description:
Based on filebrowser. When enabled a web server will be hosted on your mini.
 You can connect on it from your computer by typing http://ip_of_your_mini. 
It allows to copy files and folder and is very handy for devs as a script editor is integrated.
However HTTP filebrowser use a lot of memory so think about disabling it
when you don't use it or when you run demanding games.
For a long transfert with many files you'll prefer FTP or SSH server.
